newsitem.title: INDONESIA: INDONESIAN STOCKS - factors to watch - March 7.
newsitem.headline: INDONESIAN STOCKS - factors to watch - March 7.

text.p: Following are some of the main factors likely to affect Indonesian stocks on Friday:

* The Dow Jones industrial average closed down 1.15 points at 6,944.70 on Thursday as Wall Street braced for Friday's key U.S. jobs report for February, and as a source close to the Federal Reserve suggested the central bank might raise interest rates soon.
* Sacked legislator Sri Bintang Pamungkas and two colleagues are being held under Indonesia's subversion law because of the activities of their fledgling political party, a minister said on Thursday.
* On Thursday, the Jakarta composite index ended down 3.05 points at 683.11 points.
* On Friday, the rupiah was quoted at 2,395.00/5.50 at 0130 GMT, compared with an opening of 2,394.25/5.0
* Semen Gresik on reports it has changed its depreciation policy which could have implications for its 1996 net profit.
* Multipolar on reports retail tycoon Hari Dharmawan planned to buy a large stake in the firm.
* Citatah on market talk of a possible private placement and rights issue.
* Indosat on reports it planned to sell its stake in cellular phone operator PT Telkomsel.
